item.title: BLACKSTONE MORTGAGE TRUST INC 10-K
item.description: BLACKSTONE MORTGAGE TRUST INC, which is in the Real Estate Investment Trusts [6798] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 08, 2023 had 60363 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: may - 761 instances loan - 711 instances 3 - 542 instances 1 - 535 instances loans - 527 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
